chat_history.message: Hello, the packing was not able to deliver. I get no response from UPS. Please send me the product again, in the best case with DHL. Regards Tim Schmidthammer

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.
 
CHOOSE ONE Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Libania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The carrier has informed us that the customer has been absent several times. I have requested them to continue with the delivery, please inform the customer to keep a look out for notification that delivery is happening.

Regards,
KJ
